Muy buen juego, te guste este tipo de genero de puzles o no, es un juego que vale la pena que al menos pruebes, con amigos es mucho mas divertido. Puzles originales con una muy buena curva de dificultad. Recomendado 8/10

I absolutely recommend Portal 2.  I love the abity to make your own test rooms; it's fun and can be a bit difficult to make a decent testing room. Sonething of note is that it's easier than its predecessor, however this doesn't mean that much, sense i had a vary difficult time beating Protal 1.

Portal 2 to byÅ‚a moja chyba trzecia gra od Valve'a jakÄ… ogrywaÅ‚em, wczeÅ›niej graÅ‚em w cs 1.6, TF2 i CSGO, wiÄ™c na poczÄ…tku siÄ™ zdziwiÅ‚em, Å¼e jak to bez strzelania? Ale skÄ…dÅ¼e, strzelaÄ‡ mogÅ‚em tylko tym strzelaniem tworzyÅ‚em portale! 
DoÅ›Ä‡ szybko polubiÅ‚em Portala 2 (1 nie ogrywaÅ‚em jeszcze ale nadrobiÄ™) za grafikÄ™, wiadomo silnik robiÅ‚ robotÄ™ i nadal robi bo odpalajÄ…c nawet ponownie w 2025 z przyjemnoÅ›ciÄ… by siÄ™ graÅ‚o, a o dziwo Valve wbrew pozorom dalej wydaje patche usprawiajÄ…ce dziaÅ‚anie gry.

De los mejores juegos con cooperativo que he jugado, supera con creces al primer Portal, sin desmerecer al primero, ya que es imprescindible jugarlo antes de este. Pero en Portal 2 han combinado un modo "historia" solitario, independiente del modo coop, son otros puzzles, y ademas son muy largos los dos modos, las pistolas de portales tienen tantos modos, que te pueden servir para rebotar con el entorno, deslizarte mas rapido, todo con el fin de abrir las puertas para el siguiente nivel. Es una disfrute el juego. Por mas que ya es un clasico, y la mayoria ya lo debe haber jugado, lo recomiendo.

I can't recommend this game more, dont miss out on one of the best Co-Op gaming experiences.
awesome game , good gameplay and story

This has to be one of my favorite games of all time along with the original Portal. Simple machanics make it easy to pick up, but the complexity of some puzzles makes this game compelling and enjoyable. Add to that the voice overs and commentary which slowly unfold the story line and you can see why this has attained the status of a cult classic.

This game is a classic for a reason. Goes for less than 3$ in the steam sales so the price isn't an issue. The puzzles are fairly intuitive (only had to look up a few and that was because I was being dumb). The best thing though is it has such a lot of character to it and the dialogue and jokes are an absolute gem. The story's great, co-op's great. Really, there's no reason not to get it.

This game is a blast to play and has amazing mechanics that where a experience to behold. this game also improoved on the Mechanics of the first and incorporated a more active story which was witty and fun to play through
One of the best games ever created. Full of very clever puzzles and solid platforming gameplay. I heartily recommend this game to all my friends. 10/10.
I'm making another note here: huge success! It's not very often a sequel is as good as or perhaps even better than the first, but this game takes the cake (and that's no lie).
What's better than Portal? More Portal!!! A must buy.
This game is great
